Career Objective:
Highly motivated, hard working individual seeking position as an electrical 
supervisor in the commercial and residential building. I have extensive 
knowledge and experience in installing control panels, lighting fixtures, 
piping,  earthing and wiring.A self starter who is able to work with minimal 
supervision. Enjoys being part of a team, as well as managing, motivating 
and training a productive team, and thrives in high pressure and challenging 
working environments. 
Summary of Skills:

Ability to load others in high demand situations.

Experience in  installing power systems and panels at buildings

Installation of all electrical components and fixtures.

Extensive knowledge of commercial and residential wiring installations.

Strong supervisory, time management, and coordination skills

Excellent oral and written communication skills

Willing to work shifts and overtime at short notice.

Ability to teach others.

Excellent personal judgement.

owned facilities.

Installed conduits and plastics boxes, electrical switches and outlet.
